about_the_game:
We live in a world when almost all food is poisoned. This world is a bit mad, a bit grotesque, somewhere cynical. Money does not make sense. Healthy food has the greatest value and the most important job is a food taster.

We play as one of the tasters, who settled in the imperial palace. Our task is to taste dishes and analyze which of them affect which organs and plan in what order they should be eaten to survive.

However, poisons in the imperial court are half the trouble. Participate in conspiracies, help your colleagues, choose a side, improve your reputation and, finally, get to the emperor to complete your mission.
